text: Some men are alive simply because it is against the law to kill them.
author: E. W. Howe

text: Clever men are good, but they are not the best.
author: Thomas Carlyle

text: Under the pressure of the cares and sorrows of our mortal condition, men have at all times, and in all countries, called in some physical aid to their moral consolations - wine, beer, opium, brandy, or tobacco.
author: Edmund Burke

text: The integrity of men is to be measured by their conduct, not by their professions.
author: Junius
